ctx: intros l' l H_sorted H_prefix H_incl.
induction l as [| e l IHl].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros l' l H_sorted H_prefix H_incl.
induction l as [| e l IHl].
intros l' l H_sorted H_prefix H_incl.
induction l as [| e l IHl].
intros l' l H_sorted H_prefix H_incl.
induction l as [| e l IHl].

original: intros l' l H_sorted H_prefix H_incl. unfold Prefix in H_prefix. induction l as [| e l IHl]. - destruct l'. + reflexivity. + simpl in H_prefix. destruct H_prefix. - destruct l' as [| e' l']. + simpl in H_prefix. destruct H_prefix. + simpl in H_prefix. destruct H_prefix as [H_head H_rest]. destruct H_incl with e. * simpl. auto. * intros e H_e_in_l. apply H_incl. right. apply H_e_in_l. apply IHl; try auto. { simpl in H_sorted. destruct H_sorted as [_ H_sorted_rest]. apply H_sorted_rest. } { apply H_rest. } { intros e'' H_e''_in_l. apply H_incl. right. apply H_e''_in_l. }
